synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Forms needle-like colorless crystals. Exhibits large Stokes-shifted broadband photoemissions covering the full range of the visible spectrum (420–760 nm) with a maximum emission wavelength at ~560 nm.

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: Isostructural substitution of Cl atoms by Br in TMOF-5(Cl)
synthesis_conditions.yield: high yields and high phase purity
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Exhibits large Stokes-shifted broadband photoemissions. CIE chromaticity coordinates of (0.37, 0.39) close to pure white light (0.33, 0.33), CCT of 4258 K, and an ultrahigh CRI of 89.

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: Isostructural substitution of Cl atoms by I in TMOF-5(Cl)
synthesis_conditions.yield: high yields and high phase purity

synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Consists of a new bromoplumbate structure motif with decreased structural distortion. Exhibits a narrow UV–blue emission centered at 402 nm.

Cation exchange performed by incubation of TMOF-5(Br) in DMF solution containing 1 mol % Eu3+ to afford 0.2 mol %-exchanged Eu3+@TMOF-5(Br). Exhibits characteristic 5D0–7FJ transition of Eu3+ at 593 nm, 616 nm, and 700 nm along with the broadband photoemission from the parent TMOF-5.
